text: prati# tiShThati GRuqtE Ba#vaqtyAyuqrvai GRuqtamaqmRutaq(gm)q hira#NyaqmAyu#ScaiqvAsmA# aqmRuta#M ca saqmIcI# dadhAti caqtvAri# catvAri kRuqShNalAqnyava# dyati caturavaqt tasyA&&ptyA# EkaqdhA braqhmaNaq upa# haratyEkaqdhaiva yaja#mAnaq Ayu#rdadhAtyaq- sAvA#diqtyO na vya#rOcataq tasmai# dEqvAH prAya#ScittimaicCaqn tasmA# Eqta(gm) sauqryaM caqruM nira#vapaqn tEnaiqvAsmiqn - [  ]  7
